xboxlive_set_savedata_user: This function specifies that future file operations which operate in the save game area (i.e. all file writes, and reads from files that aren't in the bundle area) will be associated with the specified user ID pointer. This can be called as often as necessary to redirect save data to the appropriate user, or you can use the constant <tt>pointer_null</tt> to save to the generic machine storage area.
